entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries and rain showers beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
